Package main

Class TaskController

java.lang.Object
main.TaskController
public class TaskController extends Object
The Controller class in the 'Model-View-Controller'. Handles all Task object manipulations (create, update, delete and view) from the application and too the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Creates a new TaskController

      public void notifyEdit(int id, String... updates)
      A method to notify all TaskListeners that a Task has been updated
      Parameters:
      id - - The primary key/idetifier for the task being updated
      updates - - A String array containing all the updates that have been made to the task

      A method to create a new Task object containing the minimun required to create a task (task name). Also notifies all TaskListeners that a task has been created
      Parameters:

      public void CreateTask(String taskName, String details)

      Parameters:
      taskName - - The task name for the created task object
      details - - The Task's details

    • CreateTask

      public void CreateTask(String taskName, String details, LocalDate date)
      A method to create a new Task object containing all Task information (task name, task details, and due date for the task) Also notifies all TaskListeners that a task has been created
      Parameters:
      taskName - - The task name for the created task object
      details - - The Task's details
      date - - The date the task is due

    • CreateTask

      Parameters:
      taskName - - The task name for the created task object
      date - - The date the task is due

    • EditTask

      public void EditTask(int id, String taskName, String details, String date)
      Method to edit a task object Also notifes all TaskListeners that a task has been edited
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the task to update
      taskName - - The updated task name
      details - - The updated task details
      date - - The updated task date as a String

      public Task FindTaskById(int id)

      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the task to find
      Returns:
      - The Tasks with the matching id

    • FindTasksByName

      public List<Task> FindTasksByName(String name)
      A Method to retrieve all tasks that contain matching name information

      Note: This currently goes unused in the current application version, but should remain in order to add search functionality in future

      Parameters:
      name - - The Task name information to search with
      Returns:
      - A List of all matching tasks

    • FindTasksByDate

      public List<Task> FindTasksByDate(LocalDate date)
      A Method to retrieve all tasks that have a matching due date

      Note: Not currently used in full capacity, but should remain in order to add search/filter functionality in futre

      Parameters:
      date - = The date information to search with
      Returns:
      - A List of all matching tasks

    • FindTasksBetweenDates

      public List<Task> FindTasksBetweenDates(LocalDate date1, LocalDate date2)
      A Method to retrieve all tasks that fall between two dates

      Note: Method is currently used for CalendarView class, however full implementation would rely on adding it to a search/filter function in future versions

      Parameters:
      date1 - - The first date range value
      date2 - - The second date range value
      Returns:
      - A list of all matching task objects

      public void InitialLoad()

    • WriteSerializable

      public void WriteSerializable()
      The Method to write information to a serializable binary file. Primarily for the TaskSingleton class to save the current instance of it

    • ReadSerializable

      public void ReadSerializable()
      The Method to retureve infromation from the serializable binary file in the tmp folder. Primarily for the TaskSingleton class to read a previous instance of it.
